Title: Object: Repos en Egypte
Series: Recueil d'estampes d'après les plus beaux tableaux et d'après les plus beaux desseins qui sont en France
Series: Recueil Crozat
Series: Cabinet Crozat
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt; after Pier Francesco Mola; a landscape with in the centre foreground the Virgin sitting with Christ sleeping in her lap, on the right St Joseph reclining on a relief, near the statue of a sphinx; beyond, at left, an angel picking fruits in the bushes. c.1729 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: Engraved after a painting which is now in the Hermitage Museum, St Petersburg; see Cocke, 1972, cat. No.12. Plate published in the first volume of 'Recueil d'estampes d'après les plus beaux tableaux et d'après les plus beaux desseins qui sont en France' (also known as 'Recueil Crozat'), see 1907,1121.14 for comment.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (96)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
